faq.question: Can I create multiple communities on Communn?
faq.answer: Yes, you can create multiple communities on communn as per your needs. This feature allows you to establish and manage various groups that cater to different interests or purposes. Whether you want to create communities for different hobbies, projects, or discussions, it provides a user-friendly platform to support your diverse community management needs.

faq.question: Can I create and join communities with the same account?
faq.answer: Absolutely, you can create and join communities with the same Communn account. This ensures that you can easily switch between communities and manage your participation in multiple groups efficiently. Whether you're creating a community or joining others, it's all accessible from one account, streamlining your experience on Communn.

faq.question: What's the difference between public and private communities?
faq.answer: Public communities are open for anyone to join, and their posts are usually visible to the public. Private communities, on the other hand, require an invitation or approval from the community administrator to join. Posts in private communities may be restricted to members only

faq.question: Is my payment information secure when I subscribe to a paid community?
faq.answer: Communn prioritizes the security of your payment information. We use secure payment gateways and encryption to protect your data. Your payment details are never shared with the community you're subscribing to.

faq.question: What are the uses of a private community?
faq.answer: Private communities are ideal for businesses, organizations, or groups that want to maintain exclusive access to their content or services. They provide a controlled environment for a specific audience.

faq.question: Is there a cost associated with creating a community on Communn?
faq.answer: No, there is no cost associated with creating a community on Communn. Admins can create communities for free.
